name: No. 10 (Mausoleum)
description:
Part of a collection of color field items, this piece is about my recent trip to Ravenna (capital in 540 ac. of the Roman Eastern Empire) and the beauty of its ancient Byzantine art.

The colors and tonalities of this work are inspired by the decorations found on the lunette of the [0] Mausoleum of Galla Placidia.

[0] https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mausoleum_of_Galla_Placidia
